extension.name: jcomments - rate
extension.author: $Author$
extension.description:
Rating with jcomments, multicategorized and with multicriterias. Currently supporting Joomla! contents and K2.

Setting up:

  • enable plugins mentioned below
  • Provide rating categories and criterias. If you need help in doing this please refer to help site where you will find further info.
Enable the following plugins:
  • ratefix in the system folder
  • this plugin (rate) in the jcomments folder
  • if you are using K2 enable the jcomments plugin in the k2 plugin folder

field.name: com_k2_ratingcriterias
field.label: Rating criterias
field.description:
On each line provide:

category%%criterianame%%weight%%scales%%required%%ui

category = category you specify below in Rating categories
criterianame = you can use the placeholders %cat% = category name and %item% = item title
scales = descrete series of values such as 1,2,3,4,5 (default value)
weight must add up to 100 for all criterias within a criteria group
ui = select or stars

field.name: com_k2_ratingcategories
field.label: Rating categories
field.description:
K2 content categories with rating criteria categories. On each line provide:

k2category%%ratecategory%%excluded%%showas.

k2category = K2 category to be tied to this rating category
ratecategory = rating categories you will provide above, use sequential numeric values
excluded = excluded sub categories comma separated (not supported yet)
showas = actual value or as percentage (p = as percentage, v = as value)
collapsed = if rating results should be collapsed (1 = yes, 0 = no)

field.name: com_k2_showas
field.label: Show as (default and applies only if category isn't set)
